quest.name: Scavenger Deep
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Nakshs Koal is not sure if he wants to converse with you or run away screaming in terror.
objectives: Scavenge items of value from sunken ships.
Deliver the items of value to Nakshs Koal.

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: N-No, please, stay back! Ssspare me, O finless one, from your ruthless massstications! I am too young to be eaten!

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: Oh, you do not wish to eat me? That is well. I may have drawn premature conclusions, but as this is the first time I have met one of your kind, it is a sssomewhat terrifying experience...

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: But now that we have essstablished a rapport, perhaps you would be so kind as to enlighten me somewhat? Tell me of your ways and preferences. Trade is integral to cordial relationsss, after all.

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: Surely you have noticed that there are many sssunken ships in this region, many of which undoubtedly contain items of value. I ask that you search these wrecks and return with said items that I might have a better understanding of what it is I and others should ssscavenge.

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: You will find several wrecks ssscattered across the seabed, to the east and to the west of the Cups. If you would be so kind as to inspect these sssunken vesssels and return with any items of value, I would be in your debt.

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: Ahhh, the ravenousss-looking finless one returns! And with the items of value I requested, I hope...?

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: Fascinating, most fascinating... I had no idea such curiosssities held value for you and yours. Even this missshapen thing? How very odd...

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: You have given me great insssight into your culture, finless one. I may soon be ready to engage in commercial trade with others of your kind, and sssecure great profits for the Ondo!

dialogue.name: NAKSHSKOAL
dialogue.text: Oh, but how rude of me! For your service, you must be rewarded, yes? And with my newfound knowledge of what it is you covet most deeply, I can compensssate you appropriately, I should think!

obj.n: More than One Way to Skin a Stingray
